descriptions.Cloud & Infrastructure: Designing, provisioning, and managing cloud infrastructure with a focus on scalability, security, cost efficiency, and high availability across multiple cloud providers.
descriptions.DevOps & Platform Engineering: Building reliable delivery pipelines and platform tooling that enable teams to ship software safely and repeatedly using infrastructure as code, container orchestration, and GitOps practices.
descriptions.Operating Systems & Scripting: Administering Linux-based systems and writing scripts to automate routine tasks, troubleshoot issues, and glue infrastructure and applications together.
descriptions.Observability & Reliability: Implementing monitoring, logging, alerting, and incident response practices to ensure systems are observable, resilient, and meet reliability targets.
descriptions.Frontend Development: Developing modern, responsive user interfaces with a focus on performance, accessibility, and maintainable component-based architectures.
descriptions.Backend Development: Designing and implementing backend services and APIs that are scalable, secure, and easy to integrate with frontend and third-party systems.
descriptions.Databases: Designing, querying, and operating relational and NoSQL databases with an emphasis on data integrity, performance, and scalability.
